FIREBASE.DATABASE_URL: <[String] Url of the Firebase database to use>
FIREBASE.ADMIN_KEY_PATH: <[String] Absolute path (or docker app path) to DATABASE_URL's downloaded admin key>
FIREBASE.ROOT_BRANCH: <[String] Branch to use as the root of the Firebase database>
FIREBASE.ENABLE_LOGGING: <[Boolean, no quotes] Whether to enable Firebase logging (value 'true' recommended for debugging only)>
